title: Chatbot-Based Autonomous Japanese Grammar Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A language liberal arts course for science majors, cultivating grammar structure analysis skills through daily interactions with chatbots in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can utilize 50 basic Japanese grammar patterns at the N3 level with 80% accuracy through 1:1 conversations with a chatbot.
Learners can achieve a 100% correct answer rate for three consecutive attempts in sentence error correction tasks presented by the chatbot.
Learners can write self-evaluations and establish improvement plans based on weekly learning reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
